name: Soccer Trainer
description:
Want to play soccer but too bad at it  try Soccer Trainer. Soccer Trainer is a game that is made for training and having fun at the same time, this game is really challenging and once you finish all three levels of it you'll be ready for the real match. 


System Requirements
Minimum Requirements 

Cpu - Any dual core cpu

Ram- 2 gb

Graphics- Integrated Graphics

Storage- 100mb 

Recommend Requirements 

Cpu - i3 5th Generation 

Ram- 4 gb

Graphics- Nvidia Gt 610

Storage- 100mb
